title: Inside the 49ers & Chiefs, Interviews with Saquon Barkley, Jamal Adams, Arthur Blank & more (Football 1/30)
description:
Thursday's Pick Six podcast features a group of great guests to talk Super Bowl LIV and more! First, Will Brinson is joined by Joe Fortenbaugh of 95.7 The Game in San Francisco to get the perspective of the 49ers fanbase (1:15). Next, Sean Wagner-McGough chats with Bob Fescoe of 610 Sports Radio in Kansas City for a Chiefs perspective (20:15). That's followed by a lineup of great guests that stopped by the set on Radio Row in South Beach, including Giants running back Saquon Barkley (31:30), Falcons owner Arthur Blank (42:00), Seahawks teammates and twins Shaquem and Shaquill Griffin (52:20), Jets safety Jamal Adams (1:00:00) and Bears running back Tarik Cohen (1:11:00).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: The Pick Six podcast chats with radio hosts in Kansas City and San Fransisco to get the vibe of the respective cities during Super Bowl week.
